news_items.title: Amazon Announces Kiro: A New AI Coding Assistant for Spec-Driven Development
news_items.summary: Amazon has launched Kiro, a new AI-powered coding assistant that focuses on specification-driven development. Unlike traditional code completion tools, Kiro allows developers to write detailed specifications that are then transformed into production-ready code.

news_items.title: AWS Kiro AI: Amazon's Bold New Agentic IDE Turning 'Vibe Coding' into Viable Software
news_items.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) announced Kiro AI in mid-July 2025, a specification-driven agentic integrated development environment (IDE) designed to bridge the gap between freeform 'vibe coding' and production-grade software development. Kiro transforms natural language specifications into working code.
